snippet.title: Crush the Castle Legacy Collection - AVAILABLE NOW
snippet.description:
The hit Armor Games physics destruction game is back! Crush the Castle Legacy Collection lets you revisit the chaos and mayhem of the original series with upscaled graphics and new achievements. Load up your trebuchet with special projectiles to topple your foes and score big to carry yourself to victory.

AVAILABLE NOW on Steam, iOS, and Android.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1838970/Crush_the_Castle_Legacy_Collection/
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/crush-the-castle-legacy/id1597816783
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.armorgames.ctclegacy
